pages.text: Cold-blooded and venomous, snakes have long been a symbol of the dark arts.

Take caution when seeking a snake for a companion; to them, you will never be master.  A flexible nature is required to keep a snake, and to tap into the twisted magics they find most appealing.  To entrance the mind and raise the dead, one must be able to shed their skin, sometimes literally.$(br2)$(o)If spaghetti could bite.
